Watch out for an Ogre that will smash through the wall, and get the Simpleton's Spice and Twilight Herb from the corpse
Go through the fog gate and kill the Guardian Dragon boss
You may summon Sellsword Luet back in the mirror room
You will get the Guardian Dragon Soul and 37,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 9,250 souls each time
Continue on, get the Dragon Scale from the corpse and use the elevator

name: Dragon Aerie
tasks: Go up the path, ignoring the fork to the left for now, and talk to the Emerald Herald to get the Aged Feather
Head back to the fork, follow it along the bridge, and light the bonfire
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
Travel back to the Dragon Aerie bonfire
If you wish to skip Dragon Aerie entirely, take the ladder up, ride the zipline, and cross the bridge to immediately reach Dragon Shrine
If you decide to clear it, proceed very cautiously as there are many exploding Undead Citizens that will rapidly lower the durability of your equipment if allowed to explode near you
Avoid breaking as many eggs as possible to prevent the area becoming more difficult and potentially causing the final bridge to break, disallowing passage to Dragon Shrine until the area is reset
The non-respawning Guardian Dragons will not attack until provoked, either directly or by breaking eggs near them, so prioritize Crystal Lizards first
From the bonfire, go up the path, across the bridge and use a Fragrant Branch of Yore to enter the cave, then grab the Bonfire Ascetic
Further ahead on the right, kill the Crystal Lizard and get the Radiant Lifegem
Go up the path, kill the three Crystal Lizards, then kill the Guardian Dragon for the Flame Quartz Ring +2
There is another Crystal Lizard up the ramp to the right
Pick up the Darknight Stone, Dragon Tooth, Boltstone, and Soul of a Brave Warrior from the corpses
Cross the next bridge and pick up the Old Radiant Lifegem
Go across the next bridge, cross the next bridge, follow the right to take out the Dark Priestess and get the Petrified Dragon Bone, and kill the three Crystal Lizards in the area with the dragon
Kill the second Guardian Dragon for the Fire Tempest pyromancy
Pick up the Soul of a Great Hero and Large Soul of a Brave Warrior from the corpses
Go into the cave, drop off the ledge to the right, quickly turn around and kill the Crystal Lizard
Drop all the way down for another Crystal Lizard, then kill the third Guardian Dragon for Twinkling Titanite, Petrified Dragon Bone, and Petrified Something
Pick up the Soul of a Great Hero, Ring of the Evil Eye +1, Bleed Stone, Dragon Charm, and Firedrake Stone
Go into the cave on the right and drop off the ledge
Pick up the Soul of a Brave Warrior and Pharros Lockstone, and use the Aged Feather to get back to the bonfire
Go up the ladder, ignore the zip line, go down the path and drop off the ledge to get a Twinkling Titanite
Use the feather, go up the ladder, zip line across and try to drop off onto the platform to get the Soul of a Great Hero

Again
 feather back to the bonfire, go up the ladder, across the zip line and 
head across the final bridge and into the building to light the bonfire
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
Travel back to the Dragon Shrine / Shrine Entrance bonfire

name: Dragon Shrine
tasks: The Dragon Knights do not attack unless you avoid fighting the Drakekeepers or the one glowing Dragon Knight on the long staircase at the very end, or if you summon a phantom
Go up the stairs, kill the Drakekeeper, go through the door to the right, and get the Bonfire Ascetics from the chest
Use a Pharros Lockstone on the contraption hidden below the stairs and get the Judgment Set
Go up the stairs, through the archways on the left, up the stairs, get the Twinkling Titanites from the chest, then head into the tower to get the Faintstone
Jump across the gap and get the Drakekeeper's Greataxe and Drakekeeper's Greatshield from the chest
Drop down, go up the stairs, kill the Drakekeeper, cross the bridge and drop down to the two chests
Get the Titanite Slab from the chest
Go into the next area, kill the Drakekeeper, and get the Skeptic's Spice and Twilight Herb from the corpse in the alcove
Open the door, get the Third Dragon Ring from the chest, and get invaded by Dragonfang Villard
Go up the spiral staircase and kill him, pick up the Petrified Egg, and get the Petrified Something from the chest
Drop off to the ledge, get the Crystal Magic Weapon Sorcery and the Fragrant Branch of Yore from the chest, drop down again and open the door to the right
Open the next door and make your way up the stairs to defeat the glowing Dragon Knight, then go through the long corridor
Talk to the Ancient Dragon to get the Ashen Mist Heart
If you feel up to the challenge, kill the Ancient Dragon boss
You can summon Head of Vengarl just outside the boss area
You can also summon Melinda the Butcher back at the bottom of the stairs
You will get a Soul of a Giant, Petrified Dragon Bone, and 120,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 30,000 souls each time
Use your Aged Feather to return to the bonfire
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
Now that you have the Petrified Egg you can join the Dragon Remnants covenant
Travel to the Iron Keep / Threshold Bridge bonfire
Go across the bridge, inside and go right to talk to Magerold of Lanafir
While you're here incense any spells and buy anything you need from him

name: Memory of Orro
tasks: Travel to the Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower bonfire and head up to the area where you fought the The Pursuer
Talk to Benhart of Jugo, examine the tree to enter the memory. You will have about 5 minutes to complete it
Go forward, talk to Benhart of Jugo again, head up the left stairs and clear the room
Get the Fading Soul, use a Pharros Lockstone and get the Souls of a Hero from the trapped chest behind the wall
Don't waste a Pharros Lockstone on the second contraption, it's a trap
To the right of the trapped contraption is a illusory wall, use it and get the Steel Set and Fire Seed from the chests
Go up the stairs to the roof, clear it out, and hit the wooden support on the wheel in the far left corner to drop a platform
Roll off the roof on to the platform, jump into the room, and get Simpleton's Spice, Skeptic's Spice, and Bonfire Ascetics from the chests
Drop out the hole at the end of the room, get the Wilted Dusk Herbs, drop down and get the Soul of a Great Hero and Soul Vessel
Go across the courtyard, get the Large Soul of a Proud Knight, and go up the ladder to get the Soul of a Proud Knight from the corpse
Go back all the way up the stairs to the roof with ballistas and drop down on to the bridge to get the Soul of a Brave Warrior
Drop down onto the roof, go to the end, drop down and examine the giant's corpse to get the Soul of a Giant and again to leave the memory

name: Memory of Jeigh
tasks: Travel to the Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower bonfire
Go down the ladder, cross the bridge and head outside to the large door, and put on the King's Ring to open it
Rest at the bonfire, go out and drop down to get the Twinkling Titanite and Fragrant Branch of Yore, and use your feather to get back to the bonfire
Examine the tree to enter the memory. You will have about 5 minutes to complete it
You can summon Benhart of Jugo before you go through the fog gate, at the bottom of the steps
This is the third of at least three boss fights you need to summon him for and have him survive to complete his quest
You can summon Captain Drummond before you go through the fog gate
His sign will not appear unless you have already spoken to him in Memory of Vammar
You can only summon one of them. The other's summon sign will vanish when you summon one of them
Go through the fog gate, avoiding the fireballs that will rain down in this area
Get the Bonfire Ascetic from the corpse on the first platform on the left
Move forward past the first fireball area and trigger the huge rolling head
Continue forward and get the Fire Seed from the platform on the left near the end
Kill the Giant Lord boss
You were able to summon Benhart of Jugo or Captain Drummond as mentioned above
You will get the Giant Lord Soul, Giant's Kinship, and 75,000 souls
Get the Old Radiant Lifegem from beside the pillar and then go out the door and down the steps
Examine the giant's corpse to get the Soul of a Giant and again to leave the memory

name: Memory of Vammar
tasks: Travel to the Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower bonfire and head down to the area beside where you first met Mild Mannered Pate
Examine the tree to enter the memory. You will have about 5 minutes to complete it
Head forward and talk to Captain Drummond to learn the Hurrah gesture
If you have already completed the Memory of Jeigh then he will also give you the Drangleic Helm
Open the door to the left and get the Smooth and Silky Stone from the chest
Head through the other door, watching out for the enemy that breaks through the wall, and get the Fire Seed from the corpse at the end
Go through the hole in the wall and up the ramp on the left up ahead to get a Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier
Go through the archway and run for the ladder on the right, then run across the roof, drop down at the end for the Giant Warrior Club
Run to the other side of the building to the left to find a chest with a Petrified Something
Go up the ladder in the building, cross the wooden bridge, clear the roof and get the Soul of a Great Hero and Bonfire Ascetic
Go back into the building, out the back door and get the Rouge Water from the corpse beside the steps
Go up the steps and get the Old Radiant Lifegem, Soul of a Great Hero and Torch from the corpses
Examine the giant corpse to get the Soul of a Giant and again to leave the memory

name: Ancient Dragon's Memories
tasks: Travel back to the Brightstone Cove Tseldora / Lower Brighstone Cove bonfire
Make your way back to where you fought The Duke's Dear Freja
Examine the formation that has appeared in the boss room
Head forward and examine the dead dragon to get the Ancient Dragon Soul and again to leave the memory
Use your feather to get back to the bonfire

name: Shulva, Sanctum City
tasks: Make sure you have obtained the Dragon Talon from The Pit. Note you must also have completed Black Gulch and killed the two giants before the door in The Pit can be opened
You should also have a bow and arrows in your inventory to safely activate obelisks and switches from a distance
Travel to the Black Gulch / Hidden Chamber bonfire, head through the boss room, and interact with the shrine behind the Primal Bonfire
Collect the Dragon Charms and make your way to the first bonfire
Take the stairs to the left to find Old Growth Balms and a shortcut that will open later
Head back to the bonfire and continue down the path

Just
 around the corner, look left across the gap and shoot the obelisk, 
which will raise a platform that you can now drop down to
Head into the building, up the stairs, and onto the roof to find the Poisonbite Ring +1, and then drop back down to the main path
Up ahead are more obelisks, which once activated will cause structure to rise and damage the nearby Sanctum Soldiers
Collect the Lifegems, then return the second platform to its lowered position and raise it again, jumping onto the top of it as it rises
Run across to the roof and get the Dark Quartz Ring +3
Hop off the roof and look down to activate another obelisk, which will raise a platform that will allow you to get the Long Bow +7
Drop down to the path and pick up the Poison Stone
Head along the path and take the room to the left with the Corrosive Egg Insects and collect the Goldenfruit Balm from a body in the corner
Take the doorway to the left from where you entered and follow the edge of the building around, drop down to another ledge, and get the Old Growth Balm behind you
Jump across to the stairs and head back up, this time going into the other building
Outside will be another obelisk, which when activated will extend a platform from the wall
Before crossing it, drop down and pick up the Lightning Urns and head around the corner to activate another obelisk

Go
 back up the stairs, through the building, and across the walkway we 
just created to activate yet another obelisk, which will extend a 
platform below you
Drop down, make your way across to the room with more Corrosive Egg Insects, and head upstairs to get the Elizabeth Mushroom
Back to the main path, head down the stairs and pick up the Poison Throwing Knives and Cracked Red Eye Orbs next to the Poison Statue Cluster
Continue and collect Magic Bolts from a body on the left and hit the obelisk next to it
Quickly jump onto the roof of the structure that is now starting to rise and head into the building for a bonfire
Head out the other doorway and drop down to a ledge with a Dried Root on a corpse
Go through the room and to the right to pick up the Sanctum Mace, then back through the room and down the hole in the floor
Leave the building and head up the ramp back to the main path
As you continue up the hill, shoot the obelisks that you can see and get the Lloyd's Talismans and Twinkling Titanite
Before entering the building, go around the back side and activate the last obelisk

You
 should now have a series of platforms you can walk across from the 
bonfire to the roof of this building, accessed by the ladder inside
From the front of the building, look down for a platform and drop down to it
Look around for the statues with red eyes and shoot the obelisk to raise the platform you're on
Hop off as you reach the cave but turn around and wait for the structure to reach the top to loot the Torches
Go into the cave and pick up the Notched Whip +7 and the Promised Walk of Peace hex
You can choose to kill the tree in the cave for Dried Roots, attack it with a whip to restore durability to your items, or attack it with the curved sword Eleum Loyce to steal health
Return to the bonfire, either by backtracking or using a Homeward Bone or Aged Feather
Lower the first platform, drop onto it, and jump to the platform on the left for Darknight Stones
Shoot the obelisk with an arrow and jump to the middle level as it rises to get the Thunder Quartz Ring +3
Hit the obelisk that controls the third platform, jump onto it, and hit it again to return to the bonfire
Drop down to the bottommost level and make your way down the stairs and across the bridge, and get the Rusted Coins from the building straight ahead
Roll through the pots and head around to the back of the building for the Focus Souls sorcery

name: Dragon's Sanctum
tasks: Head across the bridge and into the tunnel, past the first locked door, and hit the wall switch next to another door to get a Soul of a Great Hero and Dragon Charm
Go through the doorway on the opposite side and hop down into a room with some altars
Watch out for the ghostly Sanctum Knights and quickly destroy the glowing bodies on the altars so that the enemies become corporeal, then deal with of them
Open the chests for Old Growth Balms, a Titanite Slab, a Soul Vessel, Destructive Greatarrows, and the Catarina Helm
Head into the next room and get Dried Roots from the trapped chest
Activate the switch on the ceiling using a bow and get Twinkling Titanite and Petrified Dragon Bones from the chest that is revealed
Drop down into and clear the room with the Sanctum Priestess, pick up the Human Effigy from the corpse, then activate the floor switch to rotate the contraption until you can walk through
Go down the narrow hallway and get the Repair Powder from the alcove on the left

Jump
 over the hole in the floor and head down to the tiny window in the 
wall, inside which is a distant switch for you to activate
Continue past the revealed passage and shoot another switch high up on the wall straight ahead

Go back and enter the passage, but be mindful of the small pressure plate on the floor just before the stairs, which triggers spikes to come out of the walls along the staircase, then grab the Soul of a Hero and Human Effigy
Open the chests at the bottom for Boltstones, Bleed Stones, Twinkling Titanite, Petrified Dragon Bones, and the Puzzling Stone Sword
Go back to the hole in the hallway floor, drop down, and head right
Take out as many of the Corrosive Egg Insects and their eggs as you can from here, then drop down
Loot the area for Dung Pies, Lifegems, and Old Growth Balms
Go up the stairs, grab the Poison Throwing Knives, climb up the ladder, and get Flynn's Ring from the chest
Drop down the hole, go back to the hallway, drop down the hole in the stairs again, and head right
There are many more ghostly Sanctum Knights in this area, so keep your guard up
Avoiding the spikes in the floor, hug the right wall and go through the doorway, then take a left and go up the ladder to deal with the Sanctum Priestess

Activate
 the switch on the ceiling to the left to lower the spikes, then drop 
down to the right and look for the set of stairs going down
Go down a short distance and turn back to find and activate a switch high up on the wall
Head back up and around to the ladder, then jump across the gap through the door that is now open, light the bonfire, and pick up the Sanctum Crossbow around the corner
Jump back across the gap and continue across the bridge where another Sanctum Priestess is waiting
Hit the switch to open a shortcut and open the trapped chest for Lloyd's Talismans, avoiding the ethereal Sanctum Knight as much as possible
Go across the short bridge and down the stairs to a room with several ghostly Sanctum Knights and glowing bodies lining the walls
Make your way around the room, destroying all the bodies as you go, and kill the Sanctum Knights once they become corporeal
Once the room is clear, pick up the Eternal Sanctum Key and a Sanctum Knight Helm, then head back up the stairs
Drop down to the right and get the Bloodbite Ring +1 from the chest
Drop to the main level and go around to loot Torches, Twinkling Titanite, Holy Water Urns, and a Human Effigy
Look for a switch on one of the bridge supports and activate it to reveal a room near the ladder, inside which is a chest holding the Dragon Stone
Climb the ladder and look through the opening on the spinning contraption to find another switch you can activate with your bow
Drop down and shoot it again through the smaller hole, then climb back up the ladder and shoot it one more time
Head through and get the Denial miracle from the chest
Leave the room and head towards the stairs down, keep going to get the Old Growth Balm, and down more stairs where eventually Jester Thomas will invade
After dealing with him, head through the fog gate and follow the right wall
Kill the first Imperfect and pick up the Petrified Dragon Bones just past it
Continue around the right to reach the bonfire, then carefully clear the area to loot Human Effigies, Dried Roots, and a Soul of a Great Hero
Head out of the water to a stone structure with a circular object on top of it, and insert the Dragon Stone to raise a bridge
Go inside the nearby room and hit the obelisk to activate the elevator, but before using it head out the other door and up the path for the Drakeblood Greatsword
Return to the elevator and ride it up, then take the second elevator up for a shortcut to the first bonfire in Shulva, Sanctum City
Go back down the elevator and outside, grab the Human Effigy, and go up the stairs to enter Dragon's Rest

name: Dragon's Rest
tasks: Once inside, drop down the broken staircase and go through the door
Drop down to the bridge on the right, then again from the far end, and heap up into the room straight ahead
Deal with the Drakeblood Knight, then activate the switch on the right until the large circle is on top, releasing four Crystal Lizards into the room
The room on the left is empty except for a Sanctum Knight and can be ignored

Head
 out of the room and take a right, at the end take a left and drop down 
two platforms, then take the stairs to the other side
Stay along the right wall and pick up Hexing Urns from a corpse
Continue to find another Drakeblood Knight, then go down the broken stairs

Head
 to the outer edge and take a left, take another left at the end, and 
find the hidden bonfire behind an illusory wall halfway along the left 
wall
Go down the stairs and deal with two Drakeblood Knights, then keep following the left wall until you reach a room with empty chests and a corpse with the Drakeblood Set
Head back up the stairs, past the bonfire, and find a broken bridge on the left
Make your way down a series of drops until you see an area you can jump to on the left
Jump across and head right, pick up the Vine Balms, and deal with the last two Drakeblood Knights
Pick up the Twinkling Titanite, Large Soul of a Brave Warrior, and Small Smooth and Silky Stones, then head back to the edge and make your way to the bottom of the area
Go through the fog gate and kill Elana, the Squalid Queen
You may summon Steelhart Ellie next to the fog gate
You may also summon Benhart of Jugo near the back of the room
She will randomly summon skeletons, Velstadt, the Royal Aegis, or Enslaved Pigs throughout the fight
You will get the Soul of Elana, Squalid Queen and 72,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 18,000 souls each time
Go through the passage and light the bonfire
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need, then travel back to the Dragon's Rest / Sanctum Nadir bonfire
Go through the fog gate and kill the Sinh, the Slumbering Dragon boss
You may summon Transcendant Edde next to the bonfire
You may also summon Abbess Feeva closer to the fog gate
Sinh's skin is corrosive, so bring multiple weapons, Repair Powder, the Repair sorcery, or Bracing Knuckle Ring +2
You will get the Soul of Sinh, the Slumbering Dragon and 96,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 24,000 souls each time
Examine the glowing orb to get the Crown of the Sunken King
Pick up Yorgh's Ring from a corpse in the area
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need, then travel to the Shulva, Sanctum City / Tower of Prayer bonfire

name: Cave of the Dead
tasks: Drop to the lowest level, cross both bridges, and use the Eternal Sanctum Key to open the locked door from earlier
Watch out for the Sanctum Priestesses, then open the chests for Dried Roots, the Lightning Clutch Ring, and Bonfire Ascetics
Climb the ladder and the next, deal with the Corrosive Egg Insect ambush, then climb the third ladder
Get the Sanctum Shield from the chest, then head back down the ladder and cross the bridge
At the end of the bridge, deal with the invader Rockshield Baldyr then light the bonfire

You
 may also want to light a torch as the next area is quite dark and there
 are several sconces you can light to find your way easier
Hit the obelisk to activate the elevator, then head through the cave, through the fog gate, and drop down
This area is made easier with a phantom or two, so consider summoning other players or the NPCs, Rapacious Andrei and Ruined Alfis, from this room
Drop down and make your way into a room with a few petrifying statues and Sanctum Soldiers
After clearing this level, look down the holes and eliminate as many enemies as you can from here before dropping down
There are many more petrifying statues, Sanctum Soldiers, and a few Petrifying Statue Clusters down here so move slowly so as to not over-aggro
Once the threats are dealt with, grab the Petrified Somethings from a chest and Brightbugs and Bonfire Ascetics from corpses
There is only one exit out, so take the one-way drop once you've picked up all of the loot

Down here are a few more petrifying statues, Sanctum Soldiers, and Petrifying Statue Clusters, so deal with them as before, but be cautious of the Razorback Nightcrawler that pops out of the wall halfway through
Go through the fog gate and kill the Graverobber, Varg, and Cerah boss
You may summon Rapacious Andrei as mentioned earlier
You may also summon Ruined Alfis as mentioned earlier
It is recommended to take out Cerah the Old Explorer first to avoid being shot with arrows the whole fight
You will get Petrified Dragon Bones, Twinkling Titanite, and a Titanite Slab and 60,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 15,000 souls each time
Head to the side opposite the entrance, past the petrifying statues, to find a chest containing the Flower Skirt and a corpse with Blackweed Balms
Drop down the hole, head right, and traverse the ledge until you come to another room with a chest containing the Dark Greatsword hex
Go back the other direction to find a corpse with Torches
Carefully jump to the platform and drop down to the bridge, take the elevator up, and arrive back at the bonfire
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

name: Brume Tower
tasks: Make sure you have obtained the Heavy Iron Key from the Flame Salamander pit in Forest of Fallen Giants and completed Iron Keep
Travel to the Iron Keep / Eygil's Idol bonfire and go through the boss room, past the primal bonfire, and examine the serpent shrine
Go up the stairs and use the Heavy Iron Key to open the door and ride the elevator up
Go through the fog gate and follow the stairs up, grab the Smelter Wedges from the deactivated Ashen Idol, and cross the long chain to reach the bonfire
Before continuing into the next area, prepare to meet your first active Ashen Idol with an ability similar to the Outcry pyromancy
These enemies can only be destroyed by using a Smelter Wedge on them, and do not respawn once killed
They have different abilities depending on where you encounter them, so always exercise caution
There are 11 Ashen Idols and each one plus the Fume Knight drops a Soul of Nadalia, Bride of Ash Fragment
All 12 fragments are needed to form the True Soul of Nadalia, Bride of Ash
There are appropriately 12 Smelter Wedges to be found, but one of them can only be obtained after killing the Fume Knight boss
Remember to save 4 Smelter Wedges to destroy the Ashen Idols outside of the Fume Knight's boss room, else they will heal him during the fight
Since this idol poses little threat, it can be safely skipped until the end to make optimum usage of the limited Smelter Wedges
Head into the area, avoiding the flame attacks, and take the stairs down on the left side to find the Dexterity Ring
Go back up and take the doorway on the right, follow the stairs down, and drop down the platforms to get Old Growth Balms
Drop down and head out the door, and beware of the Ashen Warriors that will pop out of the ash throughout the entire level
Grab the Twilight Herbs off the corpse and walk through all of the ashen figures to find a Large Soul of a Proud Knight
Go to the stairs and drop down the right side for a Rouge Water
Enter the doorway, descend the ladder, and walk around the pillar to get a Blackweed Balm
Go down the next ladder, pick up the Scythe +7, head through the doorway, and get the Prism Stones from the corpse
Head around the corner and open the chest for a Titanite Slab, then head back out the door and drop down to the lower ledge
Deal with the Possessed Armor and go around the corner for a chest with Human Effigies and a Bonfire Ascetic
Head back around and drop into the room with the Ashen Idol, then quickly use a Smelter Wedge to prevent it from buffing the Ashen Warriors
Go into the room near the ladder and get the Dance of Fire pyromancy from the chest
Head back and use the lever to open the giant door, then go outside to the left
Destroy the ashen figures for Old Mundane Stones, pick up the Lloyd's Talismans from the corpse, and open the obvious illusory wall
Loot the chests for Old Radiant Lifegems, Wilted Dusk Herbs, and Soul Vessels, then head back up the path and go through the door on the right
Mind the barrels as most if not all of them are explosive, which can be used to your advantage if you have Fire Arrows or other means of igniting them safely
Kill the Possessed Armor and pick up the Goldenfruit Balm
Head outside, down two ladders, and open the chest for a Caestus +8
Go through the doorway and to the right to find a bonfire
Continue past it for a locked door and a chest to the left with Twinkling Titanite
Head back the other direction and pass through a fog gate to a circular room
Take a left and go down the ladder, but do not kill the Cask Runner
Instead, walk into him to push him through the trapdoor and into the lower room
Follow the path around to the left and attack the locked door a few times until the barrel blocking it breaks, then go through and kill the Ashen Warrior
Head back the other direction through another door to a room with more Cask Runners and many explosive barrels
Herd the Cask Runners through the trapdoor and pick up the Radiant Lifegem from the corpse
Descend halfway down the ladder then climb back up to lure the Ashen Warriors and Iron Warrior over
If the Iron Warrior doesn't ignite the Cask Runners himself, use ranged fire attacks to blow up as many enemies as possible, then descend and clean up the rest
Pick up the Flame Quartz Ring +3 and disable the enemy-buffing Ashen Idol for the Soul of Nadalia, Bride of Ash Fragment
Pull the lever to open the door and loot the corpses for Twinkling Titanite, Human Effigy, Large Titanite Shards, and Dried Root
Continue around the path, watching out for the Fume Sorcerers and the ambush from behind
Pick up the Human Effigy from the corpse, then take the ladder down
Head to the open area and destroy all of the ashen figures for Large Soul of a Proud Knight, Soul of a Hero, and Soul of a Great Hero
Go back past the ladder, through the fog gate, and follow the path to the right until you reach an open doorway with a bonfire
Return to where the fog gate was, take the stairs down, and grab a Raw Stone from a corpse on the left
Before going through this next area, you might want to have either the Black Witch Veil or the Hollow Skin from later in the level, as the tower has an Ashen Idol that emits Curse
Once ready, cross the giant chain and prepare to be invaded by Mauldron the Assassin, who will be hiding just around the corner
When he gets to 50% health he will run down into the tower, but before following grab Bonfire Ascetics from the chest
Go down the stairs and disable the Ashen Idol near the bottom to stop it from applying Curse, buffing the enemies, and reviving the Possessed Armor
Don't forget to pick up the Soul of Nadalia, Bride of Ash Fragment
Head back up and get Silver Talismans from a corpse on the stairs, then drop onto a center platform for Alonne Greatbow +5
At the bottom, loot the Majestic Greatsword from the chest and Palestones from an ashen figure, then head all the way back to the bonfire
Grab the Spell Quartz Ring +3 from the circular room, then go down the hallway and get Magic Stones
Descend the ladder and pull the switch to open the first gate, then go down the hallway with the Fume Sorcerer
Continue around and deal with the other two Fume Sorcerers before opening the second gate
Hit the flaming head to send it to the other end of the hallway, then herd Cask Runners into the hallway towards the two cracked walls and use fire to blow them up
One room has Petrified Dragon Bones and the other Catarina Gauntlets and Catarina Leggings
Continue around to find an Iron Warrior waiting, then lead him back around into the large room with explosive barrels and use them to your advantage

Open
 the last two gates, then head through the archway to the left, climb 
the ladder, and pull the lever to open a shortcut to the bonfire
Go back down the ladder, across the chain, and through the fog gate
This area is filled with Scorchers, which are killed most efficiently by igniting them and getting close enough to trigger their self-destruct
Pick up the Petrified Dragon Bones, then go down the ladder and deal with the invader Quicksword Rachel
There is a Dried Root on a ledge halfway down the ladder that can be reached by careful falls and jumps
Open the doors at the bottom to find Twinkling Titanite, the Recollection hex, and a ladder
Take the ladder down, follow the path around, and open the doors on the left to a room full of Scorchers
After dealing with them, pick up the Scorching Iron Scepter from the altar, leave through the other door
Pull the lever to call the elevator, ride it up, follow the path, and drop down to arrive back at the beginning
Return to the bonfire, head out to the circular room, and use the Scorching Iron Scepter on the stone mechanism to activate the elevators and opening several new paths
Take the elevator up, then the next up as well and search the back wall as it ascends for an illusory wall, behind which is a room with the Hollow Skin
Get back on the elevator and ride it all the way up, then take the path to the right
Open the door, deal with the Possessed Armor, and pick up the Lacerating Knives
Go upstairs for two more Possessed Armors and two Ashen Warriors
Once they are dealt with, lead one of the Cask Runners to the cracked wall, use fire to cause it to explode, and pick up the Dispelling Ring +1
Open the chest in the last alcove for four more Smelter Wedges, then drop down and take the elevator down
Go around the edge and cross the gap to reach an iron door
Inside is an Iron Warrior being healed by an Ashen Idol, so either kill the Iron Warrior quickly or run past it to the glowing door to disable the Ashen Idol's effect first
Open the chest for the Life Ring +3 and the doors for Titanite Shards, a Broadsword +7, a Petrified Something, and Flame Butterflies
Destroy the boxes in the last room on the right for Titanite Chunks and a Titanite Slab
Go back out and take this elevator up to a hallway
Take out the two Possessed Armors in this room and get the Old Radiant Lifegem from the fire if you have enough healing and/or fire defense
Open the first door for a shortcut to the second bonfire, then open the other door to pick up the Simpleton's Ring

Go back to the elevator, take it down, and as it starts going back up, run off of it to land on the narrow ledge with a chest containing the Pilgrim's Spontoon, then drop down twice to return to the main level
Take the elevator up and jump for the walkway with vertical bars, kill the Crystal Lizard around the corner, and open the chest for Brightbugs

Go
 back to the elevator and take it back down to the main level again, 
return to the bonfire if needed, and take the elevator down
Follow the ledge around and go through a room with flame jets to an ashen field, out of which will spawn three Iron Warriors, so take it slow here
Destroy all of the ashen figures for Titanite Chunks, Twinkling Titanite, Skeptic's Spice, Wilted Dusk Herbs, Human Effigies, and Charcoal Pine Resins
Grab the Tower Key off of the corpse near the cliff, then head back to the elevator room and take the next one down
Hop off to the top level bridge before it reaches the bottom and get the Strength Ring from the chest
Make your way down the levels and be careful not to fall more than one level at a time, grabbing the Partizan +6 from a corpse as you go
Deal with the Iron Warrior at the bottom and open the door, then make your way across the bridge
The Possessed Armors here cannot be killed yet as there is a nearby Ashen Idol reviving them, so just run past
In the right room is a chest with the Sorcery Clutch Ring, and in the left is and elevator down
At the bottom of the elevator, stick to the right side and quickly run to the room on the far end to light the bonfire
Make your way around this area and disable all four Ashen Idols to prevent them healing the enemies and boss
Go through the fog gate and kill the Fume Knight boss
You may summon Steelheart Ellie next to the bonfire
You may also summon Carhillion of the Fold near the fog gate
If you wear Velstadt's Helm, he will use his phase 2 moveset the entire fight
You will get Soul of the Fume Knight and a Soul of Nadalia, Bride of Ash Fragment and 84,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 21,000 souls each time
Go through the doorway at the back of the room to pick up the Crown of the Old Iron King, then return to the bonfire
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need, then travel to the Brume Tower / Foyer bonfire
Go out and to the left and unlock the door with the Tower Key
This area has an Ashen Idol that emits Curse, so make sure to equip your Black Witch Veil or Hollow Skin
It also revives the Possessed Armor, so quickly go all the way down the stairs, take a left, and open the glowing door to destroy the Ashen Idol
Loot the area for the Fire Snake pyromancy, Large Titanite Shards, and Old Radiant Lifegems, then head back to the bonfire

name: Memory of the Old Iron King
tasks: Make sure you have the Ashen Mist Heart and Crown of the Old Iron King or this area won't be accessible yet
From the Brume Tower / Foyer bonfire, take the elevator up, then the next, then take a left to unlock the door and a third elevator
At the top will be the Prowlers, a total of five red phantoms, made more difficult by the Ashen Idol healing them, so take that out first
Go up the stairs and light the bonfire, then examine the glowing armor to be transported to the memory
This area is made easier with a phantom or two, so consider summoning other players or the NPCs, Drifter Swordsman Aidel and Steel-willed Lorrie, from this room
Deal with the numerous Alonne Knights while avoiding the Flame Salamander attacks
Use the doorways near the Flame Salamanders to get behind them for easy kills
Loot the bodies in the large room for Small Smooth and Silky Stones, Human Effigies, and a Skeptic's Spice, and get the Rusted Coins from the first doorway to the left
At the far end of the room, drop down the hole in front of the Flame Salamander and continue around
Beware the Flame Salamanders below that can damage you through the grated floor as you deal with the Alonne Knights
Take the stairs on the right down, take a right, and get the Twinblade +7 off a corpse
Drop down the small ledge and take the right door just in front of the Flame Salamander to circle around behind it and kill it
Hop down and go through the door on the right for the stairs leading back up
Loot the remaining corpses for Repair Powder and Radiant Lifegems
Go through the fog gate and kill the Sir Alonne boss
You may summon Drifter Swordsman Aidel as mentioned earlier
You may also summon Steel-willed Lorrie as mentioned earlier
If you kill him without taking any damage, he will perform Seppuku
You will get Soul of Sir Alonne and 80,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 20,000 souls each time
Go through the door and examine the chair to receive the final Smelter Wedge, then again to leave the memory
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need, then travel to the Brume Tower / Throne Floor bonfire
Jump across to the elevator and get the Baneful Bird Ring, go disable the nearby Ashen Idol, and pick up the last Soul of Nadalia, Bride of Ash Fragment
The 12 fragments will now combine to form the True Soul of Nadalia, Bride of Ash
Head back to the bonfire and travel to the Brume Tower / Foyer bonfire

name: Iron Passage
tasks: From the Brume Tower / Foyer bonfire, take the elevator down and open the door using the Tower Key
Follow the stairs, grab the Twilight Herb, take the elevator down, go through the tunnel to reach the bonfire, and drop down into the next room
This area is made easier with a phantom or two, so consider summoning other players or the NPCs, Drifter Swordsman Aidel and Steel-willed Lorrie, from this room

With
 this in mind, the NPC phantoms cannot be effectively used with the 
first path described, so consider waiting to summon until you've cleared
 this route and then take them on the second path
Head to the next room and pull the lever to release the Ashen Warriors from their cells, then pick up Large Titanite Shards

Unfortunately the gate on the far end is on a timer and will be closed by this point, and since the lever can only be used once, head back to the bonfire using your Homeward Bone / Aged Feather to reset it
Pull the lever again but this time rush through the enemies and dodge as necessary to avoid the Flame Salamander's attacks, and drop down at the far end before the gate closes
Deal with the Astrologist then go through the hole on the left, but do not drop down the ledge
Grab the Crimson Water from the end and head back into the cave to take the other path
There is another lever here similar to before, so pull it to open the cells, deal with the enemies, and grab the Simpleton's Spice and Torches from the cells

Return
 to the bonfire and make your way back here, but this time after pulling
 the lever, rush through same as before to reach the next room before 
the gate closes
Take the right path, drop down, and kill the Possessed Armor to reach the Old Growth Balms and Cracked Red Eye Orbs
Drop down to the upper ledge on the left to deal with the Astrologist, then drop down again for the Dried Root
Return to the bonfire if you plan on summoning the NPCs, otherwise continue to the boss and go back for the last loot later
Ignore the lever this time and take the left path instead
Stay on the upper ledge and get the Wilted Dusk Herbs from behind the Possessed Armor, then make your way through the rest of the level
Go through the fog gate and kill the Smelter Demon boss
You may summon Drifter Swordsman Aidel as mentioned earlier
You may also summon Steel-willed Lorrie as mentioned earlier
Identical to the Smelter Demon of Iron Keep, except attacks deal magic damage instead of fire
You will get Smelter Demon Soul and 75,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 18,750 souls each time
Go through the tunnel and grab the Pharros Mask from the corpse, then take the elevator and follow the path to return to the bonfire
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

name: Frozen Eleum Loyce
tasks: Make sure you have obtained the Frozen Flower from Drangleic Castle
Travel to the Shaded Woods / Ruined Fork Road bonfire, take the middle path to the Shrine of Winter, and examine the serpent shrine
Head through the door, up the stairs, and light the bonfire

This area is currently plagued by a blizzard and much is covered in ice, blocking paths and trapping items until the first boss is defeated. However, the boss is invisible until you pick up the Eye of the Priestess, so the first task is obtaining that
Proceed forward through the door and take a right, and in the first room grab the Radiant Lifegems from a corpse
Head down and outside, cross the bridge, and grab the Goldenfruit Balm from a corpse
The Retainers remain passive until you clear the blizzard, so ignore or kill as you please
Down in the courtyard is a corpse with Winged Spear +7, and to the left of the second stairs are some Torches
Go through the alley, past the fountain and a Spellsword, and grab the Small Blue Burrs through the archway to the left
Ignore the bridge for now and head up the stairs and into the building
Go through the doorway and up the stairs to the roof, drop off through the broken section to find Monastery Charms and the Dark Clutch Ring, then go back into the building
Take a left and head outside, up the stairs, and through the door on the left
Break the crates and follow the path to find the Old Bell Helm
Return to take the other door and drop down to light the bonfire
Go outside and take a right at the tree to find Ring of the Embedded on the snowdrift
Do not drop down to the fountain area but circle around the building to get the Dark Dance hex
Head up the stairs and deal with the Rampart Golem on the bridge, pick up the Radiant Lifegems from the corpse, then open the giant doors with the lever
Go up the stairs on the right, cross the bridge, and watch out for the invisible Wall Watchmen who like to fire the ballistae at you

Head through the building on the left and cross the bridge, go through the doorway on the left blocked by an Ice Golem, and pull the lever to summon an unfortunately unusable elevator that was blocking loot earlier
Go up the stairs and past the door to find an invisible ladder with a chest containing Splintering Lightning Spear at the top
Jump the gap in the ramp down and get Soul of a Great Hero from outside, then continue to the bottom of the tower for a Human Effigy
Head out and down the stairs for a Crimson Water, then outside across the bridge and up the stairs for the Eye of the Priestess
Continue down the path to find a Wall Watchman who is now visible
Keep following the path, grab Alluring Skulls and a Skeptic's Spice, and go through the fog gate to find a bonfire
Travel to the Frozen Eleum Loyce / Outer Wall bonfire
Head through the door and to the left this time
Go through the fog gate and kill the Aava, the King's Pet boss
You may summon Steelheart Ellie near the fog gate
You may also summon Masterless Glencour on the bridge
The Eye of the Priestess is absolutely critical as it makes this boss visible
You will get Soul of Aava, the King's Pet and 78,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 19,500 souls each time
Continue up the winding stairs and into the cathedral to find a bonfire
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
Travel back to the Grand Cathedral bonfire and proceed forward through the doors and up the carpeted stairs to speak with Alsanna, Silent Oracle
Agree to help her and she will stop the blizzard, unfreezing everything caught within it
Head through the large archway straight ahead and Alsanna, Silent Oracle will speak of the Loyce Knights who have not returned
There are four chairs but only one Loyce Knights, meaning three are lost and must be returned
Any that are here will assist during the Burnt Ivory King boss fight
The Burnt Ivory King can be challenged at any point, but without the four Loyce Knights the encounter becomes much harder

Not only do they assist with killing the numerous enemies before the boss spawns, but they also close the portals that the Charred Loyce Knights appear from, preventing them from overwhelming you during the fight
Because there is work yet to do, head back the way you came and open the chest for the Vessel Shield
Travel to the Frozen Eleum Loyce / Outer Wall bonfire, then go through the door and right to proceed through the now-unfrozen area for more items
Down the first set of stairs, go into the room that before had rubble obstructing it and grab the Soul Flash sorcery from the chest
Take the ladder up for the Northwarder Set then head back out and along the route
Remember that the Retainers will attack now, often after you pass to catch you off guard
In the alley, grab Dried Root, Retainer Staff, and Goldfruit Balms from the trio of corpses
Pick up Repair Powders near the fountain, then continue to the bridge and use the elevator
Be careful around the Ice Rats as they will shred your stamina and health, and pick up the Monastery Charms
Get Twilight Herbs from a corpse and continue forward to get invaded by Hexer Nicholai
Pick up Old Growth Balms and Amber Herbs from corpses in the area
Take the ladder up, open the chest for Boltstones, then go around the building, past the door, and across a bridge
Grab Magic Stones from the corpse and go into the building to light the bonfire
Head back across the bridge and into the other building, then up the stairs to find a white phantom waiting for you
Don't be fooled though, this is actually Mauldron the Assassin in disguise, so kill him now to avoid a very nasty backstab later
He will run away at some point, so chase him down so that he doesn't follow into the next area
Once he's dead, continue on and pull the lever to open the door
Go down the path to find a frosty Covetous Demon, who drops the Ivory Warrior Ring
Loot the area for Dried Roots, Large Club +8, Twinkling Titanite, Crimson Water, and Smooth and Silky Stones
Go through the cave and take the path on the left to open a shortcut
Now take the other path and be careful not to kill enemies too closely to the inactive Facsimile Giants lest they absorb the souls and overwhelm you
The golems can also be killed before being activated to make things easier
Grab Charcoal Pine Resins and a Pharros Lockstone from corpses, then take the elevator up
Ignore the enemies on the bridge to the left and head right up the snowy path and pick up Vine Balms from a corpse near a ledge
Head up the stairs, open the door, and approach the first Loyce Knight to return him to the Grand Cathedral
Go back outside and attack the snowy boulder to roll it down to close the gap in the bridge, killing the enemies along the way
The drop from here may kill you, so follow the path back down and cross the bridge, grabbing Azal's Staff, Radiant Lifegems, and Cracked Red Eye Orbs
Go into the building and up to the roof, then open the chests for a Soul Vessel, Sorcerer's Twinblade, and Divine Blessings
Continue towards the next bonfire but instead of dropping down, go through the narrow pass straight ahead, then use a Flame Butterfly to light the four sconces and open the door
Open the obvious illusory wall to the left and follow the path to get Bone Fist from the ledge
Deal with the Retainers and the Flexile Sentry and pick up the Garrison Ward Key in the back of the room
In an alcove near the door deal with the second Flexile Sentry, then follow the path up for Human Effigies
Continue on to the bonfire, keep going until you cross the bridge, then take a left and open the door using the Garrison Ward Key and light the bonfire
Examining the coffin will take you to Frigid Outskirts, so save that for later
Go across to the other door, kill the mimic on the far right to get Catarina Armor, then open the chests for a Titanite Slab, Old Radiant Lifegems, Bonfire Ascetics, and Brightbugs
Head out, up the stairs, and across the bridge, then take a right to get Prism Stones, Goldenfruit Balms, and Large Soul of a Brave Warrior
Use a Pharros Lockstone and open the wall to find a chest with Durgo's Hat
Go back and make your way down the stairs and into the next building, and go straight across to a balcony with Priest's Chime +8
At the far end of the hall, go up the ladder to get Elizabeth Mushrooms and open a shortcut, then head back down
Take the next two ladders down and go out to a balcony to pick up the Ring of Resistance +1
Go down the ladder and open the chest in the back room for Wilted Dusk Herbs
Head through the tunnel at the other end, follow the rampart, then use the elevator to open a shortcut door
Once back down, continue along the rampart and deal with the invader Castaway Witch Donna
Open the door and approach the second Loyce Knight to return him to the Grand Cathedral
Go back up the elevator and follow the right path to the bonfire
Pull the lever to open the door, and in the next room are two inactive Facsimile Giants that will activate if allowed to absorb any souls
Once the room is clear, kill the mimic on the left for the Symbol of Avarice and open the chest for Twinkling Titanite and Petrified Dragon Bones
Follow the stairs up, grabbing the Dried Roots along the way, and get invaded by Holy Knight Aurheim, who won't be a threat until a bit later
The next room has four Facsimile Giants, so pull the other enemies down the stairs to kill them so that they don't activate

Now
 go back up and be aware that killing one giant will activate another, 
so aim to get all of them extremely low on health, then kill them 
simultaneously
Open the chest they were guarding for the Curved Nil Greatsword
Go up the stairs and attack all of the barrels to find Holy Knight Aurheim, who is currently disguised as one, and kill him
Open the chest for Silver Talismans, then head back and cross the bridge, watching out for more Facsimile Giants in the next hallway
At the end, open the door and approach the third Loyce Knight to return him to the Grand Cathedral, then go up the stairs behind him to open a shortcut
Head back down, through the room where the knight was, then take a left and open an illusory wall along the right just before the corpse with Flame Butterflies
Drop down to the bridge and go straight to find a staircase, at the top of which is a chest with the Fire Clutch Ring
Go back down the stairs, cross the bridge, and drop down to another bridge further along the hallway
Grab the Twin-Headed Greatbow from a chest at the end of the hallway to the right, then drop down and return to the bonfire
Travel back to the Grand Cathedral bonfire and proceed past Alsanna, Silent Oracle
Go through the fog gate, fall down to The Old Chaos, and kill the Burnt Ivory King boss
You may summon Lucatiel of Mirrah just up from the bonfire
You may also summon Twiggy Shei in the large room in a corner
You must survive three waves of Charred Loyce Knights before the Burnt Ivory King arrives
When the Burnt Ivory King arrives, more Charred Loyce Knights will spawn from any remaining unfrozen portals
You will get Soul of the Ivory King and 92,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 23,000 souls each time
Examine the glowing orb to receive the Crown of the Ivory King, then examine the beam of light to teleport back to the Grand Cathedral
Speak with Alsanna, Silent Oracle, then optionally return to The Old Chaos or co-op the boss to farm Loyce Souls to receive items from her
Loyce Gauntlets and Loyce Leggings for 5 Loyce Souls
Loyce Armor for 15 Loyce Souls
Loyce Helm for 35 Loyce Souls
Soul of Alsanna, Silent Oracle for 50 Loyce Souls
Head to the bonfire and return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

name: Frigid Outskirts
tasks: Travel to the Frozen Eleum Loyce / Expulsion Chamber bonfire, then rest in the coffin to be transported to the Frigid Outskirts
This area will periodically be affected by a whiteout blizzard, reducing visibility to a very short distance, during which will spawn the dangerous Ice Stallions
This makes navigation quite difficult, so to avoid getting lost and aggroing too many Ice Stallions, you can stand still during the blizzard and only move when it dies down
Grab Blackweed Balm from one of the other coffins, then head to the circle of stones
This area is made easier with a phantom or two, so consider summoning other players or the NPCs, Head of Vengarl, Abbess Feeva, or Manhunter O'Harrah from these ruins
Run to the first building and get a Dried Root inside and the Mirrah Hat outside
Halfway to the next building is a corpse with Lacerating Knives
Run into the next building and only use a Pharros Lockstone if you need to activate the healing water for yourself or any phantoms
Make your way towards the next building and get Twinkling Titanite from a corpse
Run into the next building and get Human Effigies from a corpse
Head towards the cliff and look for a body on the ledge to get the Ring of the Living
Follow the path to the left and cross the bridge, and note that no more Ice Stallions will spawn down here but they will follow if they've already spawned and spotted you elsewhere
Go through the fog gate and kill the Lud & Zallen, the King's Pets boss
You may summon Head of Vengarl as mentioned earlier
You may also summon Abbess Feeva as mentioned earlier
You may also summon Manhunter O'Harrah as mentioned earlier
Zallen will enter the arena partway through the fight with Lud
You will get Soul of Lud, the King's Pet, Soul of Zallen, the King's Pet, and 56,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 14,000 souls each time
Examine the beam of light to teleport out
Return to Majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

name: Throne of Want
tasks: Travel back to the Drangleic Castle / King's Gate bonfire
Go out and down to the left to the door and put on the King's Ring to open it
Talk to the Emerald Herald and continue along the path to the fog gate
Go through the fog gate and first kill the Throne Defender and Throne Watcher
You can summon Benhart of Jugo outside the fog gate to the left
This is the fourth of at least three boss fights you need to summon him for and have him survive to complete his quest
You can summon Head of Vengarl outside the fog gate to the right
You will get the Throne Defender Soul and the Throne Watcher Soul and 68,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 17,000 souls each time
Now you need to kill Nashandra
You must have killed the Giant Lord before she will spawn
Your summons will stay with you for this fight
You will get the Soul of Nashandra and 90,000 souls
Optionally do some jolly co-op to get some extra souls. You will get 22,500 souls each time
Finally, you must kill Aldia, Scholar of the First Sin
Your summons will stay with you for this fight as well
Rewards no souls or items but unlocks an alternative ending
You may choose to claim the throne or abandon it by walking out
You will now be back at Majula, where you can finish up some final tasks before continuing to New Game Plus

name: Miscellaneous Tasks
tasks: Now that you've completed the game, Stone Trader Chloanne will sell more items
Titanite Chunks @ 6,000 souls each (Now unlimited)
Go talk to Cale the Cartographer to get Cale's Set
You should now have all the items needed for Royal Sorcerer Navlaan, so go talk to him in Aldia's Keep to get your rewards
If you have been doing Benhart of Jugo's quest then you can go talk to him in the Memory of Orro to complete it
Travel to the Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower bonfire and head up to the area where you fought the The Pursuer
Go forward, talk to Benhart of Jugo who will give you the Bluemoon Greatsword and Benhart's Set

name: King Vendrick
tasks: Now that you have at least four Souls of a Giant the fight against King Vendrick will be easier
Travel to the Undead Crypt / Undead Ditch bonfire and make your way to where you fought Velstadt the Royal Aegis
Go through the fog gate and kill King Vendrick
There are no NPCs to summon for this fight
You will get 90,000 souls
Examine the pile of armor to enter Memory of the King and speak to King Vendrick

If you have completed all three DLCs and have the crowns in your inventory, you will receive Vendrick's Blessing for the rest of the current playthrough, which causes those crowns and the King's Crown to prevent Curse and hollowing when you die
Now that you have killed King Vendrick travel to the Shrine of Amana / Crumbled Ruins bonfire
Make sure you are in human form and go back to the submerged path ahead, chop down the vines and open the door
Get the Soul of the King from the chair and the King's Set from the chest
Use your feather to get back to the bonfire

name: Dark Chasm of Old
tasks: It's best to save this for last due to its difficulty and the need to use Human Effigies every time
Also, this guide is written so that the easiest one is last, making the Darklurker fight easier to repeat if needed, but feel free to do them in any order you prefer
If you have met Darkdiver Grandahl in all three locations you can now join the Pilgrims of Dark covenant
Travel to the Black Gulch / Hidden Chamber, go up the hill and drop off by the first worm to the ledge
Go in and talk to Darkdiver Grandahl, join the covenant if you haven't already, and give him a Human Effigy to open the portal
Enter the portal and complete the area
You will need to kill six enemies. Two heavy melee, two pyromancers, and two shades
Remember to light the cauldron, using a Flame Butterfly to light your torch
Drop down the mist filled hole to complete the area
Talk to Darkdiver Grandahl to rank up in the covenant and receive the Resonant Soul Hex
Travel to the Drangleic Castle / Under Castle Drangleic bonfire, go out and around the corner to speak to Darkdiver Grandahl
Give him a Human Effigy to open the portal, enter it and complete the area
You will need to kill four enemies. One heavy melee, two fast melee, and a shade
Be very careful not to fall of the ledges in the water
Remember to light the cauldron, using a Flame Butterfly to light your torch
Drop down the mist filled hole to complete the area
You won't rank up after the second area is complete. You need to complete all three areas to get the next rank
Travel to the Shaded Woods / Shaded Ruins bonfire and drop down the hole near the second tower
Give Darkdiver Grandahl a Human Effigy to open the portal, enter it and complete the area
You will need to kill four enemies. Two fast melee, one archer, and a shade
Remember to light the cauldron, using a Flame Butterfly to light your torch
Drop down the mist filled hole to complete the area
When you drop down the fog gate in the third area you can kill the Darklurker
There are no NPCs to summon for this fight
You will get the Darklurker Soul and 35,000 souls
If you completed all areas talk to Darkdiver Grandahl to rank up and receive the Great Resonant Soul Hex
If you also killed the boss talk to him to rank up and receive the Climax Hex, Xanthous Set, and Dragon Chime
Head back to Majula

name: New Game Plus Preparation
tasks: If you missed any Crystal Lizards go and kill them
Make any thing you need from boss souls with Straid of Olaphis and Weaponsmith Ornifex
Buy any boss armors you need from Maughlin The Armorer
Buy any NPC armors you need from Merchant Hag Melentia
Buy any upgrade items you need from Stone Trader Chloanne
Upgrade any weapons or armor you need with Blacksmith Lenigrast
Infuse any weapons or armor you need with Steady Hand McDuff
Incense any spells you need with Magerold of Lanafir
Upgrade your Pyromancy Flame with Rosabeth of Melfia
Buy any consumables you need from the various vendors, like arrows
Join whatever covenant you want to start the next playthrough as
Kill any NPCs you need items from, remembering that sin carries across to NG+, so you may get invaded by Blue Sentinels
When you're ready go to the Far Fire bonfire in Majula and do this all again

name: New Game + Tasks
tasks: Get through the game once more (you can skip No Man's Wharf, Undead Purgatory and Doors of Pharros), minding four bosses:
The Lost Sinner drops Old Witch Soul which you can trade with Straid for Flame Weapon pyromancy
The Duke's Dear Freja drops Old Paledrake Soul which you can trade with Straid for Crystal Soul Spear sorcery
Old Iron King drops Old King Soul which you can trade with Straid for Blinding Bolt miracle
The Rotten drops Old Dead One Soul which you can trade with Straid for Numbness hex

name: New Game ++ Tasks
tasks: Rush to the Drangleic Castle, talk to Chancellor Wellager and buy three remaining spells:
Bountiful Sunlight @ 11,000 souls
Wrath of the Gods @ 8,200 souls
Great Chaos Fireball @ 17,400 souls
